post:
[NodeBlade Solutions, LLC](http://nodeblade.com) was founded at the start of December, 2015. We are a registered LLC in the state of Florida.

Have any questions? Contact us [here](https://my.nodeblade.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3).

The following offers were prepared exclusively for LET/LEB. Enjoy! Paying semi-annually on the Germany plans will double your storage. Paying quarterly on the KVM plans will double your RAM! (These will be applied 24-48 hours after service activation)

<hr>

### DE OpenVZ: 5120MB RAM ($7/mo)

 * 5120MB RAM
 * 1024MB vSwap
 * 4 x vCPU
 * 200GB storage
 * 2TB transfer @ 1 Gbps
 * OpenVZ in Germany
 * $7/mo
 * **[Buy Now](https://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=60)**

### DE OpenVZ: 2048MB RAM ($5/mo)

 * 2048MB RAM 
 * 1024MB vSwap
 * 4 x vCPU
 * **200GB** storage
 * 2TB transfer @ 1 Gbps
 * OpenVZ in Germany
 * $5/mo
 * **[Buy Now](https://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=23)** (use coupon code "LET2GB")

### NJ OpenVZ: 3072MB RAM ($7/mo)

 * 3072MB RAM
 * 1024MB vSwap
 * 4 x vCPU
 * 100GB storage 
 * 1TB transfer @ 1 Gbps
 * OpenVZ in New Jersey
 * Free DDoS Protection (upto 10Gbps)
 * $7/mo or $19/qtr
 * **[Buy Now](https://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=59)**

### NJ Storage OpenVZ: 128MB RAM ($15/yr)

 * 128MB RAM
 * 128MB vSwap
 * 1 x vCPU
 * 80GB storage 
 * 0.5TB transfer @ 1 Gbps
 * OpenVZ in New Jersey
 * Free DDoS Protection (upto 10Gbps)
 * $15/yr
 * **[Buy Now](https://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=55)**

### NJ KVM: 512MB RAM ($4/mo)

 * 512MB RAM
 * 512MB Swap
 * 2 x vCPU
 * 10GB SSD Storage
 * 750GB transfer @ 1 Gbps
 * KVM in New Jersey
 * Free DDoS Protection (upto 10Gbps)
 * $4/mo or $12/qtr (double RAM)
 * **[Buy Now](https://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=57)**

### NJ KVM: 1024MB RAM ($6.8/mo)

 * 1024MB RAM
 * 1024MB Swap
 * 4 x vCPU
 * 10GB SSD Storage
 * 1TB transfer @ 1 Gbps
 * KVM in New Jersey
 * Free DDoS Protection (upto 10Gbps)
 * $6.8/mo or $18/qtr (double RAM)
 * **[Buy Now](https://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=58)**
